overview: In the working-class suburbs of Melbourne, three friends are in the process of putting together the ultimate rock band; INN OF THE DAMNED. The only thing is they are missing is the perfect drummer. Over the course of one night, at their local pub, they meet a series of drummers but none of them live up to their lofty expectations.
tagline: if 'CLERKS' and 'THIS IS SPINAL TAP' had a bastard child...
title: Inn of the Damned
